first.name: Teacherbot
first.content: Have you seen three kittens running around here? There should be six of us... but I guess a few got bored and ran off.

1.content: These students and I are on a nature excursion. We're taking water samples and studying local ecology.

2.name: Sparkle
2.content: Can you help us find them please?

3.name: Daisy
3.content: Yeah, we're tired of being educated. We want to go home!
